main.name: Michael Thomas
main.bio: I was born and raised in Queens, New York. I went to University of Michigan where i got my bachlor's degree in Business Administration and a minor in Biology. My goal was to run my own dental school so I went Barry University in Miami where I got my Master's in Biomedical Science. While I was in Miami I found a sales job and started my journey in selling websites for digital marketing agencies. When I moved back to New York I was in charge of running the sales department of a agency that worked with large brands. My goal is to learn how to code websites and tie that in with my selling abilities.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I have aquired

work.title: Sales Manager
work.description: Build, train, and oversee sales team.

work.title: Digital Marketing Consultant
work.description: Consultant for existing clients, as well as aquistion for new clients.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: If you need to find out the weather for a city you are visiting or in, here you go!

projects.title: BoozieNight
projects.category: An app that will help you pick a movie as well as pair your movie choice with an alcoholic beverage

projects.title: Brown Bag
projects.category: Brown Bag allows restaurants to process orders without the need of a large waitstaff, along with cutting out the fees associated with current popular food apps. Instead of charging a large percentage of each transaction, Brown Bag will only charge a small, monthly fee while providing the same level of service

projects.title: Progressive Budget
projects.category: This app will help you budget.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
